Text: Democratization (or democratisation) is the transition to a more democratic political regime.
Triplets:<democratization
1:
--------------------
Text: Democratization:  It also refers to substantive political changes moving in a democratic direction.
Triplets:<democratization
2:
--------------------
Text: Democratization:  It may be the transition from an authoritarian regime to a full democracy, a transition from an authoritarian political system to a semi-democracy or transition from a semi-authoritarian political system to a democratic political system.
Triplets:<Democratization
5:
--------------------
<Text: Democratization:  Democratization itself is influenced by various factors, including economic development, history, and civil society.>
Triplets:<Democratization
6:
Text: Democratization:  The ideal result from democratization is to ensure that the people have the right to vote and have a voice in their political system.

Triplets:<democratization
